alert.note: Alert for Cass; Richland (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 05 at 10:33PM CDT until August 06 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN CLAY...NORTHERN WILKIN...SOUTHEASTERN CASS AND NORTHERN RICHLAND COUNTIES... At 1033 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Colfax, or 20 miles northwest of Wahpeton, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Kindred, Oxbow, Abercrombie, Walcott, Christine, Wolverton and Colfax. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 30 and 55. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
